metadata.Title: CVE-2018-4378 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.Description:
A memory corruption issue was addressed with improved validation. Thisissue affected versions prior to iOS 12.1, tvOS 12.1, watchOS 5.1, Safari12.0.1, iTunes 12.9.1, iCloud for Windows 7.8.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-4378` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

gir1.2-javascriptcoregtk-4.0 - 2.22.3-1
gir1.2-javascriptcoregtk-4.1 - 2.22.3-1
gir1.2-javascriptcoregtk-6.0 - 2.22.3-1
gir1.2-webkit-6.0 - 2.22.3-1
gir1.2-webkit2-4.0 - 2.22.3-1
gir1.2-webkit2-4.1 - 2.22.3-1
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.0-18 - 2.22.3-1
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.0-bin - 2.22.3-1
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.1-0 - 2.22.3-1
libjavascriptcoregtk-6.0-1 - 2.22.3-1
libwebkit2gtk-4.0-37 - 2.22.3-1
libwebkit2gtk-4.1-0 - 2.22.3-1
libwebkitgtk-6.0-4 - 2.22.3-1
webkit2gtk-driver - 2.22.3-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: webkit2gtk package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.22.3-1').
qtwebkit-opensource-src package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
